meanings.definition: The structure of a material at a microscopic level.
meanings.sent1: Under the microscope, the microstructure of the metal was visible.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the microstructure of alloys to understand their properties.
meanings.sent3: The tiny elves in the microstructure of the rock were having a party.
meanings.sent4: The microstructure of the city was like a complex puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent5: The microstructure of the leaf looked like a delicate lacework under magnification.

meanings.definition: The arrangement of particles or components within a small scale.
meanings.sent1: The microstructure of the soil determined its fertility.
meanings.sent2: Examining the microstructure of the circuit board revealed a flaw in the design.
meanings.sent3: The microstructure of the sand resembled a tiny bustling city.
meanings.sent4: The microstructure of the painting was so detailed, it seemed alive.
meanings.sent5: The microstructure of the snowflake was intricate and beautiful under the microscope.
